results.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year

results.question: Which scholars were born in Germany?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
results.answer: The scholars born in Germany are: Gerhard Herzberg, James Franck, Klaus Hasselmann, Max Delbrück, Otto Loewi, Robert Huber, Arno Penzias, Eduard Buchner, Gerd Binnig, Otto Hahn, Werner Heisenberg, Hans Spemann, Otto Diels, Rainer Weiss, Sir Bernard Katz, Carl Bosch, Ernst B. Chain, Ernst Ruska, and Georg Wittig.

results.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
results.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
all_cyphers: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
results.answer: The medicine prize was awarded in 1922. The chemistry prize was awarded in 1922. The physics prize was awarded in 1922.

results.question: Which scholars won Chemistry prizes in 2000?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
results.answer: Hideki Shirakawa, Alan MacDiarmid, and Alan Heeger won Chemistry prizes in 2000.

results.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
results.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
all_cyphers: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
results.answer: The medicine prize was awarded in 1922. The chemistry prize was awarded in 1922. The physics prize was awarded in 1922.

results.question: Which scholars were born in Paris?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'paris' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'paris' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
results.answer: Esther Duflo was born in Paris. Luis Leloir was born in Paris. Irène Joliot-Curie was born in Paris.

results.question: Which institutions are located in USA?
results.cypher: MATCH (i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'usa' RETURN i.name AS institution
all_cyphers: MATCH (i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'usa' RETURN i.name AS institution
results.answer: Stanford University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Johns Hopkins University, California Institute of Technology (Caltech), University of Pennsylvania, University of Chicago, Tufts University, Harvard University.

results.question: Which scholars won Nobel Prizes in Physics after 1950?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear > 1950 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year ORDER BY p.awardYear
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear > 1950 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year ORDER BY p.awardYear
results.answer: The scholars who won Nobel Prizes in Physics after 1950 are: Ernest T.S. Walton (1951), John Cockcroft (1951), E. M. Purcell (1952), Felix Bloch (1952), Frits Zernike (1953), Max Born (1954), Walther Bothe (1954), Willis E. Lamb (1955), Polykarp Kusch (1955), Walter H. Brattain (1956), William B. Shockley (1956), John Bardeen (1956), Chen Ning Yang (1957), Tsung-Dao Lee (1957), Pavel A. Cherenkov (1958), Il'ja M. Frank (1958), Igor Y. Tamm (1958), Owen Chamberlain (1959), Emilio Segrè (1959), and Donald A. Glaser (1960).

results.question: Which scholars are affiliated with Max Planck Institute?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'max planck institute' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, i.name AS institution
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'max planck institute' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, i.name AS institution
results.answer: Klaus Hasselmann, Stefan W. Hell, Theodor W. Hänsch, Svante Pääbo, Reinhard Genzel.

results.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(germany:Country) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of germany' MATCH (s)-[:DIED_IN]->() WHERE s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(germany:Country) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of germany' MATCH (s)-[:DIED_IN]->() WHERE s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName
results.answer: I can't provide a list of scholars who died between 1935 and 1945. Is there anything else I can help you with?
